amendment.description: Amendment increases the "Office on Violence Against Women--Violence Against Women Prevention and Prosecution Programs" funding by $14 million.
amendment.purpose: An amendment to revise amounts appropriated for the "General Administration--Salaries and Expenses" account, and increasing the amount made available for the "Office on Violence Against Women--Violence Against Women Prevention and Prosecution Programs".

vote.text: On agreeing to the Inslee amendment (A022) Agreed to by recorded vote: 412 - 18 (Roll no. 730).

action.text: House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A022) offered by Mr. Inslee.
Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
Roll call votes on amendments in House
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Inslee amendment (A022) Agreed to by recorded vote: 412 - 18 (Roll no. 730).
